caption.p: Current condition (baseline, A) and probability change in Hantavirus infection risk according to five scenarios: only sugarcane expansion (B), 2040â€“2050 temperature anomalies from the RCP4.5 (C) and RCP8.5 scenarios (D), combined effect of sugarcane expansion with RCP4.5 (E) and RCP8.5 (F) scenarios.
